terms.title: Introduction
content: Welcome to the Avolta Sunglasses Recommendation App. By using this app, you agree to the following terms. If you do not agree, please refrain from using the app.

terms.title: Use of the App
content: The app is for personal use to recommend sunglasses based on facial scanning.
Users must provide accurate information during their interaction.
The app's recommendations are for informational purposes and may vary based on user preferences.

terms.title: Intellectual Property
content: All content, including designs, logos, and software, is owned by Avolta Design Agency. Reproduction or use without permission is prohibited.

terms.title: Data Collection and Usage
content: Refer to our Privacy Policy for details on data collection and handling.
By using the app, you consent to the use of your data for improving recommendations.

terms.title: Limitation of Liability
content: Avolta is not liable for any issues arising from the use or inability to use the app.
Recommendations provided are based on available data and should not be considered as professional advice.

terms.title: Governing Law
content: These terms are governed by the laws of India. Disputes will be resolved in the courts of Indore, India.

terms.title: Updates to Terms
content: Avolta may update these terms periodically. Users will be notified of changes within the app.

privacyPolicy.title: Information We Collect
content: Facial Scans: Used only to provide sunglass recommendations. No facial data is stored.
Email Address: If provided, used to send shortlisted products.
App Usage Data: Collected to improve app functionality and user experience.

privacyPolicy.title: How We Use Your Information
content: To recommend sunglasses that suit your face.
To send you shortlisted products via email (if opted).
To display other product ranges and provide relevant services.

privacyPolicy.title: Sharing Your Information
content: Sales Agents: If you call an agent via the app, necessary details (like shortlisted products) may be shared to assist you.
Third-Party Services: No personal data is shared without your consent.

privacyPolicy.title: Data Storage
content: Your data is stored temporarily on the iPad and deleted after your session ends.
Emails sent for shortlisting are handled securely.

privacyPolicy.title: User Choices
content: You can choose not to provide your email, but this will limit the app's functionality for saving shortlists.

privacyPolicy.title: Security
content: We employ industry-standard measures to secure your data.
However, we cannot guarantee complete security.

privacyPolicy.title: Updates to Policy
content: This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically.
Changes will be communicated in the app.

privacyPolicy.title: Contact Us
content: For questions or concerns, contact us at:
Email: support@avolta.com
